resources.string:
We have developed this application to help people in which there are all emergency numbers of India. You can dial these numbers anytime and anywhere. It has been given a lot of activities so that you can see your History and your Recent Activities. If you wish, you can save these numbers in your phone and share these numbers with others by Emergency Number activity. What is the work of every activity for your help, it is written below. "


"
Features "

" SOS: With the help of this button your can add any number on QuickTouch one by on, so that you can dial any number very quickly. "
" "
" Feedback: If you would like or have some suggestion about app so you can send the feedback by click on three dot which showing on home screen at top right. "
" "
" QuickTouch: Here are all the number that you add to the help of SOS so that you can dial numbers very quickly. "
" "
" Recent: Here are all your recent activities. "
" "
" Emergency Numbers: Here are all Indian Emergency numbers and here you can SHARE and SEND these numbers these number, Just Swipe Right the list item. "
" "
" Saved: Here are all number that you saved in your phone in emergency number activity. "
" "
" History: Here are all your call history which you can DELETE just swipe right. "
" "
" Setting: Where you can delete your data. "
" "
" This application is developed by developer: AKASH SAINI. For the purpose of help people in any kind of emergency. "
" "
" Developer: Akash Saini
